answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some sample RFP’s which you might find useful.
The City of Mill- Creek, Wash. has a detailed scope of services section on page 5 of their RFP. In addition to a general plan for economic development they request an organized system of implementation, benchmarks and checks on the progress of plan.
http://www.millcreek-plan.org/files/2011/05/Strategic-RFP.pdf
Las Vegas, Nev. has a similar RFP you can view below.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13036/RFP_for_Consulting_Services
I also included an RFP from Indian Trail, N.C. you can find the services outline on page 3.
http://www.indiantrail.org/uploads/file/RFP%20and%20RFQ/Request%20for%20Qualifications%20Econ%20Devel.pdf
City of Ferndale, Wash. has a specified their economic plans to be completed in phases and details what each phase should entail for the consultant.
http://www.ci.ferndale.wa.us/userfiles/2EDC%20RFP%20V_4%2007%2002%2008%20FINAL.pdf
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Tracy Miller
text:
A Florida city is looking for RFP's for the development of an Economic Development Strategic Plan/Update.  This municipality is primarily interested in the scope of work used within the RFP.  Please respond here or directly to tmiller@transformgov.org.  
Best Regards,  
Tracy Miller  
Florida Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation
title: RFP for Economic Development Strategic Plan or Update
